remarks: Remove hypothesis from ~ grur1 .  Illustration of how to remove a "definitional hypothesis".  This makes its uses longer, but the theorem feels more self-contained.  Looks preferable when the defined term appears only once in the conclusion.  (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.)
statement: bj-grur1 $p |- ( ( U e. Univ /\ U e. U. ( R1 " On ) ) -> U = ( R1 ` ( U i^i On ) ) ) $.
